propertyDefinition.name: XVoltFeedback
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two x jaws (Volts)

propertyDefinition.name: YVoltFeedback
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two y jaws (Volts)

propertyDefinition.name: XVoltFeedbackRedundant
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two x jaws (REDUNDANCY) (Volts)

propertyDefinition.name: YVoltFeedbackRedundant
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two y jaws (REDUNDANCY) (Volts)

propertyDefinition.name: XVoltSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: returned setpoint between the two x jaws (Volts)

propertyDefinition.name: YVoltSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: returned setpoint between the two y jaws (Volts)

propertyDefinition.name: XOpenFeedback
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two x jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: XOpenFeedbackRedundant
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two x jaws (REDUNDANCY) (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: XOpenSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: returned setpoint between the two x jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: XMaxOpenSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: maximum opening of the X jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: XMinOpenSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: minimum opening of the X jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: YOpenFeedback
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two y jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: YOpenFeedbackRedundant
propertyDefinition.description: spacing between the two y jaws (REDUNDANCY) (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: YOpenSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: returned setpoint between the two y jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: YMaxOpenSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: maximum opening of the Y jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: YMinOpenSetpoint
propertyDefinition.description: minimum opening of the Y jaws (cm)

propertyDefinition.name: XInPlace
propertyDefinition.description: 1:unmatch X status not activated/0:unmatch X status activated

propertyDefinition.name: YInPlace
propertyDefinition.description: 1:unmatch Y status not activated/0:unmatch Y status activated

propertyDefinition.name: XDriverOn
propertyDefinition.description: the status of X jaw driver of VCEU

propertyDefinition.name: YDriverOn
propertyDefinition.description: the status of Y jaw driver of VCEU

propertyDefinition.name: YDriverStatusOk
propertyDefinition.description: 1:driver Y status OK/0:driver Y status not OK

propertyDefinition.name: XDriverStatusOk
propertyDefinition.description: 1:driver X status OK/0:driver X status not OK

propertyDefinition.name: rawState
propertyDefinition.description: 0:uninitialized 1:moving 2:in position 3:failure

propertyDefinition.name: potentiometerCalibA0
propertyDefinition.description: Calib factor of Potentiometers 1-2-3-4 (offset) Volts

propertyDefinition.name: potentiometerCalibA1
propertyDefinition.description: Calib factor of Potentiometers 1-2-3-4 (slope) Volts/cm

propertyDefinition.name: safetyConditionOk
propertyDefinition.description: Safety condition (1:OK/0:not OK)

propertyDefinition.name: XNotOpen
propertyDefinition.description: 0:X jaws opened/1:X opened ls not reached

propertyDefinition.name: YNotOpen
propertyDefinition.description: 0:Y jaws opened/1:Y opened ls not reached

propertyDefinition.name: XNotClosed
propertyDefinition.description: 0:X jaws closed/1:X closed ls not reached

propertyDefinition.name: YNotClosed
propertyDefinition.description: 0:Y jaws closed/1:Y closed ls not reached
